attributes.action: To reconsider his change in cutting the 10% tax band for the poorest paid!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister may be saying that he is offering support to reduce the impact on the poorest in society but historically there is not a full take up of this help. There are also a group of people who are not eligible for any help. People who have to take early retirement below the age of sixty on a reduced company pension. They will see their tax double with no safety net! There will be others hit by this change.We urge you to go back and rethink this change!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
